text: The Alfa Romeo 166 is a car produced by Alfa Romeo. It replaced the Alfa Romeo 164 in late 1998 and facelifted in 2003 with right hand drive production ending in 2005. It was produced until 2007 with no direct successor. == Engines == === Petrol === * 2.0 Twin Spark 110 kW (150 hp) and 114 kW (155 hp) * 2.0 V6 TB 151 kW (205 hp) * 2.5 V6 138 kW (188 hp) and 140 kW (190 hp) * 3.0 V6 162 kW (220 hp) and 166 kW (226 hp) * 3.2 V6 177 kW (241 hp) === Diesel === * 2.4 JTD 100 kW (136 hp) and 110 kW (150 hp) * 2.4 Multijet 129 kW (175 hp) and 136 kW (185 hp) ==References== 166 Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles
title: Alfa Romeo 166
